name: 陳信安
objective:
本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法，其內容包括：常微分方程式、級數解、拉普拉斯轉換、線性代數等。
This course introduces engineering students the mathematics in practical engineering problems. The topics covered include: ordinary differential equations, series solution, Laplace transform and linear algebra.
schedule:
0. Review of calculus
1. Ordinary differential equation
2. Series solution
3. Laplace transform
4. Linear algebra

(將視情況機動調整)
